title: Are there any League communities around Southland, NZ?
body:
Hey there guys! I was just wondering if there were any communities around Southland, New Zealand. Unfortunately I just moved down south and I have no idea what is here. Any help would be awesome, thanks all!

- SuppLivesMatter [OCE], (*not MG Guardian [NA]*)

replies.body: There's a facebook group for stuff around Canterbury and such but that's all I know. It's called Southern Summoners
Awesome thanks for the heads up, it's a good place to start looking
